description: He managed the account of Angola's state oil firm Sonangol, once chaired by Africa's richest woman.
title: Isabel dos Santos: Banker found dead in Lisbon
title_page: Isabel dos Santos: Banker found dead in Lisbon - BBC News
maintext: "I am a private businesswoman who has spent 20 years building successful companies from the ground up, creating over 20,000 jobs and generating huge tax revenue for Angola... I have always operated within the law and all my commercial transactions have been approved by lawyers, banks, auditors and regulators," she said.
